nodes.text: A male Pantoran was an employee of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars.

A Pantoran was hired by the Jedi Order as a maintenance worker at the Coruscant Jedi Temple. Stationed at the Temple's hangar, he was a survivor of a bombing during the Clone Wars. When questioned by Padawan Ahsoka Tano and Russo-ISC, he revealed that he believed that Jackar Bowmani was responsible for the bombing.
